mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiankangzhishi_name as jiankangzhishiName ,a.jiankangzhishi_photo as jiankangzhishiPhoto ,a.jiankangzhishi_types as jiankangzhishiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.jiankangzhishi_content as jiankangzhishiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM jiankangzhishi a
and a.id in
#{item}
and a.jiankangzhishi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiankangzhishiName},'%')
and a.jiankangzhishi_types = #{params.jiankangzhishiTypes}
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and a.jiankangzhishi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiankangzhishiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
